param.name: ppunkClient
param.para: The address of a pointer to a variable of type that receives the client used by the desk bar.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if the client object is returned, or an error value otherwise.

summary.para: Notifies the object that the rectangle has changed.

param.name: prc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that specifies the child bar's desired size.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

summary.para: Sets the client specified by punkClient.

param.name: punkClient
param.para: A pointer to a variable of type that specifies the client used by the desk bar.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
